ygData.subject: Re: quivers
ygData.msgSnippet: I havent bought a quiver, and for the price, i dont see why anyone should, unless we could put it in the ammo slot, which at this point i dont believe we can.
ygData.messageBody:
I havent bought a quiver, and for the price, i dont see why anyone
should, unless we could put it in the ammo slot, which at this point i
dont believe we can.
Putting the arrows in a backpack seems to work just fine as long as you
have at least one of the same type of arrow in the ammo slot.

I have bought the fletching book, but i dont recall anything mentioning
bowing. Maybe my memory is fading with old age, but does anyone know
where in Freeport i may aquire a book on this subject.
And at what fletcing level should i try making bows and what are the
components.
I think you need a staff of some kind and a string.
I have also heard cams may need to be used.
Any ideas?

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
